name: 2025 9th International Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Applications
content: Paper Publication: ◆ICBEA 2025 papers will be published in International Conference Proceedings, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. ◆International Journal of Pharma Medicine and Biological Sciences (IJPMBS, ISSN: 2278-5221), which will be indexed by Embase, CNKI, ProQuest, etc.
